data.eml:eml: First record of the genera Diaparsis Foerster and Phradis Foerster (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Tersilochinae) from Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khalaim, Andrey I., Ruiz-Cancino, Enrique (2018): First record of the genera Diaparsis Foerster and Phradis Foerster (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Tersilochinae) from Mexico. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 63: 61-72, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.63.24491, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.63.24491
